modShortDescription: This is a simple mod that adds more vanilla friendly food and drink. As of now it contains 27 new food items and 8 new drinks, each with their own schematics.
modDescription:
This is a simple mod that adds more vanilla friendly food and [drink](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-drinks/), this mod is still a WIP, although this only means that ATLA5 plan on adding more as time goes on. As of now it contains 27 new food items and 8 new drinks, each with their own schematics.

The intention of this mod is to expand on the [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) and water system of the base game, without the potential hassle of new crops, meat types, etc.

## Drinks

* Berry Tea
* Iced Mixed Tea
* Iced Coffee
* Vodka – +20% Bartering
* Snowberry Gin – +50% Block Damage
* Carbonated Water – Efficient Digestion
* Blueberry Soda
* Kvass Soda

## Foods

* Hashbrown
* Mash Potato
* Corn Grits
* Blueberry Jam
* Yucca Jam
* Egg Salad
* Fried Meat
* Corn Chips
* Blueberry Jam Sandwich
* Yucca Jam Sandwich
* Coffee Cake
* Mushroom Pie
* Meat and Beer Pie
* Fried Mushrooms
* French Toast
* Fried Egg
* Honey Glazed Meat
* Custard Pie
* Rock Candy
* Blueberry Candy
* Snowberry Candy
* Sponge Cake
* Blueberry Sponge Cake
* Yucca Sponge Cake
* Plain Fudge
* Sugar Extract
* Energy Tablets

## Changelog

Updated for A19.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Atla55/7D2D-Mods/tree/master/More%20Vanilla%20Food)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15623-more-vanilla-food/).
